messages_events_Language_Reset: lang reset` - Reset the language to: `ENG`
messages_events_PS:
-------------------------------
`Attention:`
1. Don't use quotation marks `< >`
2. `<1-99m|h|d>` use only **ONE LETTER**.
You cannot use minutes, hours, or days together.
-------------------------------
messages_events_PS2:
`Pay attention:`
The commands below will be deprecated from May 1, 2022. Use Slash commands.
At the very bottom there is a link to connect Slash commands to your guild.
-------------------------------
messages_events_Start_Text_Giveaway:
gift start <title>` - Start Giveaway with special text.
`
messages_events_Start_Text_Time_Giveaway:
gift start <title> <1-99m|h|d>` - Start Giveaway with special text and with a by timer stop.
`
messages_events_Start_Text_Time_Count_Gi:
gift start <title> <1-99m|h|d> <number>` - Start Giveaway with special text, with a by timer stop and with certain number of winners.
`
messages_events_Start_Time_Count_Giveawa:
gift start <1-99m|h|d> <number>` - Start Giveaway with a by timer stop and certain number of winners.
`
messages_events_Stop_Number_Giveaway: gift stop <number>` - Stop Giveaway with more winners.
messages_events_Add_Me_To_Other_Guilds: :robot: [Add me to other guilds | add Slash commands](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=808277484524011531&permissions=2147511296&scope=applications.commands%20bot)
messages_events_Send_Private_Message: I sent you a private message
messages_events_Failed_To_Send_Message: Failed to send message. Maybe I'm on your blacklist!
message_gift_Not_Admin: You are not Admin or you can't managed messages!
message_gift_Need_Stop_Giveaway: First you need to stop Giveaway
giveaway_registry_Error:
The giveaway was canceled because the bot was unable to get the ID
your post for editing. Please try again. **Write us what exactly happened.
We are trying to fix this bug. Support guild:** https://discord.gg/UrWG3R683d
gift_Invalid_Number_Description:
The number of winners must be less than the number of participants!
You entered a number: `{0}`
Number of participants: `{1}`
This action did not cause the deletion: **Giveaway**!
gift_Invalid_Number_Description_Loop:
In order not to get loop, we had to reduce the number
of winners by one. Since their number was equal to the participants
language_change_Not_Admin: You are not Admin or you can't managed server
slash_Stop_No_Has: Currently there is no active Giveaway
slash_Stop_Errors: You have not completed the Giveaway
slash_Errors: You made a mistake, look at the documentation
send_slash_message: Created Giveaway in the text channel: <#{0}>
gift_special_role: This Giveaway only for a Special Role:
slash_error_only_for_this_role: You can't make a Giveaway just for a Role: `
slash_error_role_can_not_be_everyone: `@everyone` can only be used to mention!
button_giveaway_not_access: You don't have access to [this]({0}) Giveaway!
button_dont_worry:
Don't worry, you're a participant.
We checked you in the database.
button_you_not_register:
It looks like we haven't registered you yet.
`Try again after 5 seconds`. If it happens again, write to us in support.
The link is available in the bot profile.
